nodes.text: This individual was a male Pacithhip who served as a member of the Black Hole Pirates during the Clone Wars. Like the rest of the pirates, the Pacithhip lived aboard the Random Mallet, trapped within the Unknown Regions by the gravitational pull of a black hole. The Pacithhip pirate wore robotic stilts to help him fit into a humanoid-dominated galaxy. He was well-versed in starship technology, able to tell the make of a hyperdrive and whether it had been customized if given time to examine it.
